article_title: Microfibres employee files lawsuit over WARN Act violation
article_text:

og.description: A former Microfibres Inc. employee has filed a lawsuit against the defunct manufacturer for failure to pay and provide benefits under the federal WARN Act.
og.title: Microfibres employee files lawsuit over WARN Act violation
